title: 2022 NFL Draft Focus: Brady Quinn breaks down QB class & his favorite prospects at each position (Football 11/24)
description:
Ryan Wilson is joined by Brady Quinn to discuss the 2022 NFL Draft. BQ dishes his thoughts on the crop of quarterbacks including Matt Corral, Kenny Pickett, Sam Howell, Malik Willis and Carson Strong. He also shares his favorite prospects at each position.
(7:15) Quarterbacks
(21:00) Wide receivers
(29:00) Running backs
(33:30) Tight ends
(38:00) Offensive line
(43:30) Defensive line/EDGE/LBs
(51:30) Defensive backs

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix

Ryan Wilson is joined by Brady Quinn to discuss the 2022 NFL Draft. BQ dishes his thoughts on the crop of quarterbacks including Matt Corral, Kenny Pickett, Sam Howell, Malik Willis and Carson Strong. He also shares his favorite prospects at each position.

(21:00) Wide receivers
